instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1278: What is A1278? A1278 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook or Macbook Pro Unibody from years Late 2008, Mid 2009, Mid 2010, Early 2011, Late 2011, Mid 2012 with EMC 2254, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-2327, 820-2530, 820-2879, 820-2936, 820-3115..

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> early 2011 running slow random restarts
threads.message: Hey, I'm helping one of my local shops i work with on a customers <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 2011.  He got a log report and was wondering if anyone can make anything from it? he was doing an osx install when he developed the report but the customer was already reporting it was crashing in osx. I'm having him run asd if it will manage to load into it.  anyway i'm uploading the log

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> early 2011 running slow random restarts
threads.message:
No Title

okay it took 2 times running os asd and he got an error he did not send me everything but this photo so i asked him for more.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> early 2011 running slow random restarts
threads.message: That error means either the DC in board is bad, the charger is bad, or the charger is not plugged in (most commonly)

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> early 2011 running slow random restarts
threads.message: Sorry i should have posted back here. he was getting that error because he was using a 85W charger.  he is getting no error in either asd and i had him run it a bunch of times.  at this point idk what the issue is

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> early 2011 running slow random restarts
threads.message: Could be anything. External boot ok? Bad HDD cable. Bad RAM, bad RAM slot. If none of those it is pretty much hopeless.
